summary: A commandâ€‘line utility that runs a CoinJoin tumbler participant. It sets up the JM client, loads wallet configuration, retrieves mixing schedules and logs, filters incoming orders, manages taker sessions, updates order status on completion, and coordinates the mixing process using Twisted's reactor.
business_intent: Enable users to increase the privacy of their Bitcoin transactions by automatically participating in CoinJoin mixes, handling order selection, fee estimation, and transaction coordination without manual intervention.
